reviewText:
Bayanihan Instructional Video Series volume 2 includes popular Spanish influenced dances (Maria Clara Suite) and also Muslim influenced dances of the Southern Philippines. The Singkil dance is certainly the most exciting and intricate of Philippine folkdances. The drums, kulintang, gongs, the Prince and Princess, and many supporting dancers stepping lively in and out of multiple crossed bamboo poles is one of the world's most exciting folkdances.
A lot can be learned by watching the steps and hand movements, the costumes, and the choreography of the premier Folk Dance Group of the Philippines.
